## GenericHtmlDirectoryReader class

A generic HTML directory reader that parses index-style HTML pages to list directory entries (files and subdirectories).

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class GenericHtmlDirectoryReader implements HttpDirectoryReader 
```
**Implements:** [HttpDirectoryReader](doc/markdown/./base.httpdirectoryreader.md)

## Remarks

- Targets simple directory listings produced by common HTTP servers (e.g., Apache, Nginx). - Extracts entries from `<a>` elements and attempts to infer size and modified time from surrounding table rows or text content. - Skips external links, parent-directory links, and anchors. - Normalizes and resolves paths using the provided `HttpDirectoryReaderContext`<!-- -->.

Limitations: - Parsing depends on the serverâ€™s HTML structure; non-standard listings may yield incomplete metadata. - Size/mtime extraction uses best-effort heuristics and may be unavailable for some servers.
